medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began after dinner last night, resolving after several hours. The pain re-occurred after breakfast this morning. Patient also reported 12 episodes of diarrhea yesterday. A similar episode occurred early in the year and resolved spontaneously.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Idiopathic seizure disorder from childhood, thyroiditis, laryngopharyngeal reflux, recent gallstone pancreatitis
